body_html:
Also, I tried modifying torch/serialization.py and changed this

deserialized_objects[view_key] = storage[offset:offset + view_size]
into this
deserialized_objects[view_key] = torch.Storage([storage[x] for x in range(offset,offset + view_size)])
It loads without error, but the model doesn't produce the right outputs.

body:
Also, I tried modifying torch/serialization.py and changed this


`                    deserialized_objects[view_key] = storage[offset:offset + view_size]`
into this
`                    deserialized_objects[view_key] = torch.Storage([storage[x] for x in range(offset,offset + view_size)])`
It loads without error, but the model doesn't produce the right outputs.
